Name: Tales from Ahrum
About the game: Tales from Ahrum is a single player old school turn based RPG game. In this game you control a group of characters and all starts when the protagonist, Viviane, which suddenly gets involved by an attack thats occurred in her city and starts to pursuit those responsables. During the journey the group will have access to some quests and revelations about what the attack was and what was the real purpose behind the scenes. For their aid, weapons, armors and itens creation will be present. They can also configure armors and weapons with some augments to get different effects, chose wich element is the most effective to help mages in battles, configuring them in relics, orbs or a focus. But, as stronger the party gets, the stronger the enemies will be, so make the correct choice and remember, never let your guard down.
